attributes.action: Abolish Final salary pensions for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As most companies are now abolishing final salary pensions in the workplace due to cost. Why is the taxpayer funding  final salary pensions for MP's who have embezzled money through claiming outrageous expenses?

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
